name: Super Mario Bros but you play with SAITAMA
name_original: Super Mario Bros but you play with SAITAMA
description:
Super Mario Bros but you play with SAITAMA made for fun hope you like it.

Install instructions
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on .exe
controls
  • move left : left Arrow
  • move right : right Arrow
  • jump : z
  • punch : x
